LanguageData.NodSculptureLarge.label: Brotherhood sculpture
LanguageData.NodSculptureLarge.description: These statues are a sign of the power of Nod.
LanguageData.TiberiumPot.label: tiberium pot
LanguageData.TiberiumPot.description: A pot, a special pot to be exact.
LanguageData.TiberiumPot_Blueprint.label: tiberium pot (blueprint)
LanguageData.TiberiumPot_Blueprint_Install.label: tiberium pot (blueprint)
LanguageData.TiberiumPot_Frame.label: tiberium pot (building)
LanguageData.Nod_PowerConduit.label: nod power conduit
LanguageData.Nod_PowerConduit.description: A set of electrical cables for moving power around. Can be placed under walls and other buildings. Nod's hardening techniques make it fireproof.
LanguageData.Nod_PowerConduit_Blueprint.label: nod power conduit (blueprint)
LanguageData.Nod_PowerConduit_Frame.label: nod power conduit (building)
LanguageData.Light_Nod.label: Light of Nod
LanguageData.Light_Nod.description: Every Nod believers fanatically prefers deep red light. It's cool, but there's no doubt that it's unhealthy for their eye.
LanguageData.Light_Nod_Blueprint.label: Light of Nod (blueprint)
LanguageData.Light_Nod_Blueprint_Install.label: Light of Nod (blueprint)
LanguageData.Light_Nod_Frame.label: Light of Nod (building)
LanguageData.Nod_Grave.label: Mausoleum
LanguageData.Nod_Grave.description: This mausoleum can house multiple dead. It's to honor our fallen brothers.
LanguageData.Nod_Grave_Blueprint.label: Mausoleum (blueprint)
LanguageData.Nod_Grave_Frame.label: Mausoleum (building)
